summary: BLEW 3 TIRES IN LESS THAN 3000 MILES.  FIRST WAS ON DELIVERY OF VEHICLE FROM MANUFACTURER, NEXT 2 WERE ON SAME DAY LESS THAN 200 MILES APART (ON OPPOSITE SIDES OF VEHICLE).  2ND ONE LITERALLY EXPLODED NEARLY CAUSING A CRASH.  DYNAMIC TIRE SAYS NOTHING WRONG WITH TIRES.

2013 KEYSTONE FUZION 301 BUMPER PULL TRAVEL TRAILER. TRAILER WAS BRAND NEW AND THE FIRST TRIP OF 200 MILES HAD A STRUCTURAL ISSUE WITH THE CHASSIS. THE TONGUE OF THE TRAILER WHICH CONNECTS THE TRAILER TO THE TRUCK HAS BEGUN TO BUCKLE. I HAVE A CERTIFIED WEIGHT TICKET TO VERIFY THE GROSS VEHICLE WEIGHT RATING WAS WITHIN FACTORY SPECS. THIS CAN BE A DEADLY HAZARD ON PUBLIC ROADS BECAUSE THE TRAVEL TRAILER WEIGHS 12,500 POUNDS, 13,000 IS GROSS VEHICLE WEIGHT RATING.  *TR
